body.p:
Henderson Feby 11 1863
W T Samuels Esq
Frankfort Ky
Dear Sir

Will you be good enough to have me appointed Notary Public. I have qualified, with my law partner S B Vance, as admr of my deceased uncle Milton Young -- & having a large business to settle -- it will save me much trouble if I am authorized to administer an oath --
I would like for you to have my partner S B Vance also appointed.

Your Friend truly
John Young Brown

P. S.
I wish you would also have S D Sneed appod N. P.
J. Y. B.

James W. Tate.
Send Mr. Comns for Brown & Sneed of Henderson
W. T. Samuels
